docs.snippet: LEAD: The Texas Eastern Corporation, a major pipeline company that transports natural gas to the Northeast from the Gulf Coast, has accepted a friendly takeover offer valued at $3.2 billion from the Panhandle Eastern Corporation, the companies sai...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Texas Eastern Corporation, a major pipeline company that transports natural gas to the Northeast from the Gulf Coast, has accepted a friendly takeover offer valued at $3.2 billion from the Panhandle Eastern Corporation, the companies said today.

headline.main: Panhandle Agrees to Buy Gas Concern

docs.snippet: LEAD: Jerome Robbins, master choreographer, famed Broadway director, is leaning against a piano and singing. The words are not from his new show, ''Jerome Robbins's Broadway,'' which opens next Sunday at the Imperial Theater. Nor are they from any...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Jerome Robbins, master choreographer, famed Broadway director, is leaning against a piano and singing. The words are not from his new show, ''Jerome Robbins's Broadway,'' which opens next Sunday at the Imperial Theater. Nor are they from any of the many musicals he directed and/or choreographed on Broadway from 1944 to 1964, from ''On the Town'' to ''Fiddler on the Roof'' - 11 of which are represented in this new production.

headline.main: Jerome Robbins Dances Back to Broadway

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: At age 71, he's as lean as the backboard pole in the playground below his fifth-floor Harlem apartment. But arthritis had Pop Gates sitting on pillows on the long curved couch in his living room. Asked if he would rather move to a favorite chair, he smiled.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Louis Gossett Jr., the new, improved, sober and unresentful Louis Gossett Jr., was talking about freedom. The freedom that ticket-buying audiences have given him to play roles he calls colorblind, and the freedom he feels now from the drug and alcohol addiction that beseiged him after his Oscar-winning performance in ''An Officer and a Gentleman.

headline.main: Lou Gossett Jr. Battles the Hollywood Stereotype
